div.p:
To assist our families during the closure of school due to Governor Whitmer's announcement, we have compiled a list of resources and updates.
These resources are posted below. We will continue to update this information as needed.
If you have questions or concerns, please leave a message at 810.591.9120 and we will return your call as soon as we can.

h2.span:
Click the image below to access the
Remote Learning Center:

a.span: Updates from the State of Michigan
I think I was exposed to COVID-19, what should I do?

h3.style: margin-bottom: 6px; line-height: 21px; color: rgb(28, 30, 33); text-align: left;

br.br:
At this time, meetings of the Bentley Board of Education will be held virtually. If you would like to join the meeting, follow these steps:
Locate the event in our "Upcoming Events" on the district calendar posted on our web page.
Click on "more details>>".
Choose an option to join: Join Hangouts Meet or Join by Phone.
If you have any questions, please call the administration office at 810.591.9120.

div.p: It is the policy of Bentley Community Schools that no discrimination practices because of sex, race, color, national origin, or handicap be allowed in providing instructional opportunities, job placement assistance, employment practices, and policies governing student conduct and attendance. Any person suspecting a discriminatory practice should contact Bentley Community Schools at 1170 N. Belsay Rd., Burton, MI 48509 or call 810-591-9100.
